article.title: Bioinformatics Workshops on Galaxy and Metagenomics
article.tease: Preceding the Global Biodiversity Genomics Conference

article.content: The Galaxy workshop will will introduce genomic data analysis with a differential expression example, using RNA-Seq data and the Galaxy Platform.
